DOC.brief_summary: This clinical study aims to investigate the anti-HPA antibodies caused neonatal alloimmune thrombocytopenia in Chinese pregnant women. The survey and data collect will help form an appropriate clinical screening procedure
DOC.brief_title: Study on the Anti-HPA Antibodies Caused Neonatal Alloimmune Thrombocytopenia in Chinese Pregnant Women
DOC.criteria: 1228 weeks pregnant Chinese women between Jan 1, 2017 and Dec 31, 2018 Not willing to participate in this study Plan to terminate pregnancy early
